channel.title: Blogs on realm
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on realm

item.title: Dunjin Devlog #1
item.description: I have a lot of nostalgia for games that I have never played. You know those fake games that they would put on in an episode of a 90s sitcom or something which had generic fantasy tropes, but nothing identifiable enough to get them sued? Or that episode where characters dress up to play D&D (which I found out way too late that no one does irl)? I miss those games.

item.title: hello!
item.description: my name is Smaran. I am a first-year MSCS student based in Atlanta, GA üêù. I like making well designed technology to help people work and feel better. While my specialization is in systems and multimedia, I also like working on tools and testing - I ESPECIALLY like when these areas mix. browse my code! my github look at my art! my portfolio hire me! my resume. this is my website.
